response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which is valued at $12,000 by both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a product that is worth more than its asking price, providing you with significant value. I believe this offer will allow us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 11000}
